Happy World Wetlands Day! After successful scrub management last winter by the #UST and #NorthDevonNIA projects, this #culmgrassland has regenerated and is a mosaic of scrub, grassland & wetland, helping store water. Thanks to @SouthWestWater, @Interreg2Seas, @DevonCC, @EnvAgency https://t.co/xb6FSZm0rT

urls.title: Flood information for Holderness Drain - GOV.UK

text:
More #floodalerts for our region this morning. River Hull upper & central catchments remains in force & Holderness Drain levels continue to fluctuate. Our partners @EnvAgencyYNE  are monitoring the situations closely.

urls.title: Mousehole property protection - your flood resilience
urls.description: Find out more about the free property protection available to you as a homeowner in Mousehole. Hosted by the Environment Agency, these two virtual events include a presentation on the free property protection available and give you the opportunity to ask questions.

text:
Its not too late to join @EnvAgencySW and @JBAConsulting today at 1pm for a virtual event, to find out how #Mousehole properties can benefit from FREE property #FloodResilience measures. Book your place here: https://t.co/4a2Rg2e1DF
#Cornwall #BeFloodReady https://t.co/yUwLbCEGcO
